channel.title: The Gamer Word

channel.itunes:subtitle: The most excellent podcast for Pro-White Gamers and their extensive families.
channel.itunes:summary: The most excellent podcast for Pro-White Gamers and their extensive families.

channel.itunes:keywords: Gamer LegacyofKain LoK LordoftheRings LotR ShadowofMordor ShadowofWar VideoGamesReviews Watchdogs

item.title: The Gamer Word Episode 20- Diversity training at Hogwarts
item.itunes:title: The Gamer Word Episode 20- Diversity training at Hogwarts
item.itunes:subtitle: It's been discussed before. This cauldron of trannyisms and controversy has been threatening to bubble over for some time and turn everything into a mashed up Polyjuice potion nightmare. Join the men as they get their first taste of Hogwarts Legacy and dâ€¦
item.itunes:summary:
It's been discussed before. This cauldron of trannyisms and controversy has been threatening to bubble over for some time and turn everything into a mashed up Polyjuice potion nightmare.

Join the men as they get their first taste of Hogwarts Legacy and discuss the psychosis of the "former fans", how you can truly NEVER let "the left" have anything because it is never good enough, how even the trantifa agree with Ruckus that Harry Potter is "problematic" right wing (IE. the House Elf Question), and how in the end, there looks to be plenty to enjoy and have a laugh at, as you race around Hogwarts and pet all the cats (there are so many).
item.description: It's been discussed before. This cauldron of trannyisms and controversy has been threatening to bubble over for some time and turn everything into a mashed up Polyjuice potion nightmare. Join the men as they get their first taste of Hogwarts Legacy and discuss the psychosis of the "former fans", how you can truly NEVER let "the left" have anything because it is never good enough, how even the trantifa agree with Ruckus that Harry Potter is "problematic" right wing (IE. the House Elf Question), and how in the end, there looks to be plenty to enjoy and have a laugh at, as you race around Hogwarts and pet all the cats (there are so many).

item.itunes:subtitle: Bobby and Ruckus are joined by the illustrious Gordon Kahl to discuss Western style games, what makes them good, what could make them great and how the current culture war that we are engaged in needs to be fought on all avenues, all as Gordon threatens â€¦

item.title: The Gamer Word Episode 18- The original Red Pill
item.itunes:title: The Gamer Word Episode 18- The original Red Pill
item.itunes:subtitle: We told him he has to stop teasing the fans and now it is finally here. Bobby, Rolo and special guest Magnus come forward to talk about the game that served as the original Red Pill, cleverly disguised as a stealth action rpg.
item.itunes:summary: We told him he has to stop teasing the fans and now it is finally here. Bobby, Rolo and special guest Magnus come forward to talk about the game that served as the original Red Pill, cleverly disguised as a stealth action rpg.

item.itunes:subtitle: Nathaniel Socelli joins the men to discuss the first attempt of them Kojimer productions at making a game. Unfortunate complications occur as Rolo and Ruckus actually completely agree on a game, which set off a chain reaction in the chiral network, possiâ€¦
item.itunes:summary: Nathaniel Socelli joins the men to discuss the first attempt of them Kojimer productions at making a game. Unfortunate complications occur as Rolo and Ruckus actually completely agree on a game, which set off a chain reaction in the chiral network, possibly to try and prevent the ugly truth about this game (which could have been good) from coming to light.

item.title: The Gamer Word Episode 15- Fever Dreams of a non White Final Fantasy ft. Tranny Potter
item.itunes:title: The Gamer Word Episode 15- Fever Dreams of a non White Final Fantasy ft. Tranny Potter
item.itunes:subtitle: Ruckus and Bobby (Rolo was out chasing women, showing he is only a casual gamer) discuss the fever dream of where the gaming industry finally corrects the injustices in the upcoming Final Fantasy XVI and where Hogwarts will fly the Tranny flag and Harry â€¦
item.itunes:summary: Ruckus and Bobby (Rolo was out chasing women, showing he is only a casual gamer) discuss the fever dream of where the gaming industry finally corrects the injustices in the upcoming Final Fantasy XVI and where Hogwarts will fly the Tranny flag and Harry Potter will be known as the vanguard of the Tranny supremacist movement.
item.description: Ruckus and Bobby (Rolo was out chasing women, showing he is only a casual gamer) discuss the fever dream of where the gaming industry finally corrects the injustices in the upcoming Final Fantasy XVI and where Hogwarts will fly the Tranny flag and Harry Potter will be known as the vanguard of the Tranny supremacist movement.

item.title: The Gamer Word Episode 14- Kojimer War Crime Simulator
item.itunes:title: The Gamer Word Episode 14- Kojimer War Crime Simulator
item.itunes:subtitle: The men are joined by Kai as we discuss his "favorite war crime simulator" aka the last game of an amazing series that was abandoned by its parents in favor of trying to make more cinematic things... and pachinko machines. A game where you get to experieâ€¦
item.itunes:summary: The men are joined by Kai as we discuss his "favorite war crime simulator" aka the last game of an amazing series that was abandoned by its parents in favor of trying to make more cinematic things... and pachinko machines. A game where you get to experience how modern day EMTs feel and learn that the way to keep the "demon" at bay is to engage in conservation and save the animals (Unless you wanna be gay and disarm your nukes).
item.description: The men are joined by Kai as we discuss his "favorite war crime simulator" aka the last game of an amazing series that was abandoned by its parents in favor of trying to make more cinematic things... and pachinko machines. A game where you get to experience how modern day EMTs feel and learn that the way to keep the "demon" at bay is to engage in conservation and save the animals (Unless you wanna be gay and disarm your nukes).

item.title: The Gamer Word Episode 13- Cyber Krunk 2070
item.itunes:title: The Gamer Word Episode 13- Cyber Krunk 2070
item.itunes:subtitle: We are joined by Magnus to discuss the "Best worst game of 2020": What was, what could have been, and what has been denigrated as "Tranny simulator 2077" ultimately did not even serve in that purpose, despite the eerie predictions of the Prophet Sam Hydeâ€¦
item.itunes:summary:
We are joined by Magnus to discuss the "Best worst game of 2020": What was, what could have been, and what has been denigrated as "Tranny simulator 2077" ultimately did not even serve in that purpose, despite the eerie predictions of the Prophet Sam Hyde (peace be upon him) coming more and more true.

So regardless of which brown girl you end up romancing, remember the most important thing is whether or not you chose Penis 1.
item.description: We are joined by Magnus to discuss the "Best worst game of 2020": What was, what could have been, and what has been denigrated as "Tranny simulator 2077" ultimately did not even serve in that purpose, despite the eerie predictions of the Prophet Sam Hyde (peace be upon him) coming more and more true.So regardless of which brown girl you end up romancing, remember the most important thing is whether or not you chose Penis 1.

item.title: The Gamer Word Episode 10- Swole Dorks of Jolly Cooperation
item.itunes:title: The Gamer Word Episode 10- Swole Dorks of Jolly Cooperation
item.itunes:subtitle: Ruckus and Bobby are joined by a couple Sun Bros to discuss the game series that taught them to never give up, that it is important to always fight and move forwards even in the face of overwhelming despair, what is really between a thots legs, and how sâ€¦
item.itunes:summary: Ruckus and Bobby are joined by a couple Sun Bros to discuss the game series that taught them to never give up, that it is important to always fight and move forwards even in the face of overwhelming despair, what is really between a thots legs, and how simping is only ever acceptable to save your bros. Only through this heroic struggle, with and for your bros, do you learn what it means to Git Gud.
item.description: Ruckus and Bobby are joined by a couple Sun Bros to discuss the game series that taught them to never give up, that it is important to always fight and move forwards even in the face of overwhelming despair, what is really between a thots legs, and how simping is only ever acceptable to save your bros. Only through this heroic struggle, with and for your bros, do you learn what it means to Git Gud.

But at least fantasy New York is far better than real New York (give you one guess as to (((why))) that is).

item.title: The Gamer Word Episode 7- Liberal Bingo- G4 you lose
item.itunes:title: The Gamer Word Episode 7- Liberal Bingo- G4 you lose
item.itunes:subtitle: The men remark and reminisce about how good things could get started with allegedly hot hostesses and then quickly turn into a cesspit of anti-Gamer ideology that ultimately flops because the goblins that want to destroy gaming do not care about money asâ€¦
item.itunes:summary: The men remark and reminisce about how good things could get started with allegedly hot hostesses and then quickly turn into a cesspit of anti-Gamer ideology that ultimately flops because the goblins that want to destroy gaming do not care about money as much as they do ruining good things. As a bonus: any network execs can listen to the show and get ideas for actually good and popular shows and characters.
item.description: The men remark and reminisce about how good things could get started with allegedly hot hostesses and then quickly turn into a cesspit of anti-Gamer ideology that ultimately flops because the goblins that want to destroy gaming do not care about money as much as they do ruining good things. As a bonus: any network execs can listen to the show and get ideas for actually good and popular shows and characters.

item.itunes:title: The Gamer Word Episode 6- Legacy of Bacala- a 5 minute character review
item.itunes:subtitle: Special guest Nathaniel Socelli comes aboard to discuss one of the best storytelling games of our generation. All this with only watching 5 minutes of a character review video even. Nostalgia abounds as we revisit the land of Nosgoth to review the start â€¦
item.itunes:summary: Special guest Nathaniel Socelli comes aboard to discuss one of the best storytelling games of our generation. All this with only watching 5 minutes of a character review video even. Nostalgia abounds as we revisit the land of Nosgoth to review the start of serious storytelling becoming a major part of gaming

item.itunes:subtitle: Join the men as they discuss the rampant racism and anti trans bigotry that runs amongst Gamers, and what games journalists feel needs to be done about it. Learn to not take the Woke-caine and discover a cursed new tag that could be applied to games in tâ€¦
item.itunes:summary:
Join the men as they discuss the rampant racism and anti trans bigotry that runs amongst Gamers, and what games journalists feel needs to be done about it.

Learn to not take the Woke-caine and discover a cursed new tag that could be applied to games in the future.
item.description: Join the men as they discuss the rampant racism and anti trans bigotry that runs amongst Gamers, and what games journalists feel needs to be done about it. Learn to not take the Woke-caine and discover a cursed new tag that could be applied to games in the future.
